Comments_List: Knowledge of basic linear algebraic concepts as well as an introduction to linear system control.
Basic and fundamental linear algebra. Mathematical logic and proving skills.
This course provided knowledge regarding abstract linear algebra and an intro to systems and control
A lot of detail taken to introduce the framework for working with linear systems and control concepts. Pace of course was too fast towards end of semester.

very nice courses. However, the pace is too slow for the first half term and too fast for the second half where the course content became harder and harder. The lecturer should spend more time on the second half.
